name: A Simple Sunset Star Collector Game
name_original: A Simple Sunset Star Collector Game
description:
This is just a simple game of collecting 3 stars in Unity and it's my 1st time making it with the engine.

Controls are W to move up, D to move right, S to move down, A to move left, and Right Mouse Click to Jump.

That's all about it with this game hope you all enjoy it
